Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more visually stunning, "Red Cliff" (2008) is an epic Chinese battle drama directed by John Woo. With its stunning action sequences and impressive cast, including Takeshi Kaneshiro and Tony Chiu Wai Leung, this film will transport you to ancient China.
